english.segment1: If I make it to heaven. I may be as bloody as hell. Would you still take me?. I'm afraid that you might say, "Depart from me, I never knew you."
english.segment2: I'm in the wrong body. I'm in the wrong body. I'm in the wrong body. I must have stumbled in.
english.segment3: All the love I want to give, Gets caught between every rib. What does that make me?. I have good intentions, But no exit for them to come out right through.
english.segment4: I'm in the wrong body. I'm in the wrong body. I'm in the wrong body. I must have stumbled in.
